title: Add const qualifiers to immutable Particle class members
description: Particle class has several members that could be marked const for better code safety: m_opacityEffect (ParticleSystem.h:47) is never reassigned after construction. Consider adding const qualifiers to enforce immutability where appropriate.

title: Extract remaining magic numbers to ParticleConstants
description: While magic numbers are mostly extracted to ParticleConstants, some remain hardcoded: font-size values (12px on line 40, 16px on line 220 of ParticleSystem.cpp). Extract these style properties to named constants for better maintainability.

title: Implement AchievementSystem.cpp or remove declaration
description: AchievementSystem class declared in ParticleSystem.h (lines 76-96) but no corresponding implementation file exists. Either create src/components/AchievementSystem.cpp with full implementation or remove the declaration if the feature is not needed. Affects build completeness.

title: Remove duplicate ParticleSystem.cpp from CMakeLists.txt
description: ParticleSystem.cpp appears twice in CMakeLists.txt source lists (around lines 23-33 and 34-44) for the main executable. This causes build inefficiency and potential confusion. Consolidate into single source list or remove duplicate entry.
